d.Name: SAP Document and Reporting Compliance: Electronic Tax Register Books for Greece
d.Description:
This integration package provides the SAP Cloud Integration content which is part of the Document and Reporting Compliance Solution for Greece. It enables the communication of electronic documents to the myDATA platform as well as retrieving documents from myDATA. It also supports subsequent functions such as sending Classifications and cancellation of Invoice to myDATA platform.

This integration package requires SAP Document Compliance for Greece solution to be installed in SAP ERP or SAP S/4 HANA On-Premise or SAP S/4 HANA Cloud. Refer master note 2930400 for more details.
d.ShortText: This integration package provides content to integrate SAP Document and Reporting Compliance with the Greece Tax system AADE(myDATA).
